## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [exo70C2-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Pollen tube growth is altered with respect to wild type. Mutant pollen tubes display a higher growth rate and insufficient cell wall deposition resulting in repetitive transient stops and bursts of the growing tip.
